title: European social democracy in crisis
abstract: Neo-liberal policies led to the global financial crisis. So why are centre-left parties facing electoral meltdown? Henning Meyer reports on a major pan-European debate on the problems facing social democrats, and offers some potential solutions
publisher: Political Studies Association of the United Kingdom
